text: Describe a time when you overcame a challenge at work or school. What did you learn from that experience?
Explain a topic you're passionate about as if teaching it to someone new. Why does this topic interest you?
Tell us about a goal you're working toward. What steps are you taking to achieve it?
Describe a person who has influenced your life. What qualities do you admire in them?
Share your thoughts on a recent book, movie, or experience that made an impact on you.
Imagine you're introducing yourself to a new team. What would you want them to know about you?
